name: WOMENITE
briefDescription: Womenite aims to create an equal society through education, love and empowerment. We are conducting educational workshops and campaigns on issues like child sexual abuse, gender and menstrual hygiene in schools, colleges and other organizations. We recently worked with the District Magistrate of North Delhi on Beti Bachao, Beti Padho campaign(Indian government's campaign to educate girl child). We also conducted Naari ki Chaupals with the Self Help groups of women in 17 of their villages. Addressing the dire need of our society for awareness regarding women's health and education, modules on Menstrual Hygiene and Beti Bachao Beti Padhao were being delivered to women of all age groups.
